findings.title: Solidity version must be fixed
findings.description: The solidity version should be fixed to ensure consistency between development and deployment phases.

findings.title: Use safe math library operation at all places
findings.description: Safe math operation is not used to subtract allowance in transferFrom() function.

findings.title: Token Name Inconsistency
findings.description: The token name 'MM Moon Money' in the smart contract contradicts with the token name 'Moon Money Chain' in the document.
